62ace401-1c65-4043-bc60-5f34c1ba4822.name: 特化
62ace401-1c65-4043-bc60-5f34c1ba4822.notes: @类型：天使，恶魔，精灵， 鬼魂等@

57ce9f71-83ce-4a84-acf1-c5aa21a7ad43.name: 战斗反射
57ce9f71-83ce-4a84-acf1-c5aa21a7ad43.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

66cbcc8e-677e-4a56-9a6b-8c15972c104a.name: 健康
66cbcc8e-677e-4a56-9a6b-8c15972c104a.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

70dbd37b-02f9-4963-8927-7ae0426aea3e.name: Fit, Very
70dbd37b-02f9-4963-8927-7ae0426aea3e.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

049fd5ee-80f8-48de-a453-8700b95bd217.name: Heroic Archer
049fd5ee-80f8-48de-a453-8700b95bd217.notes: Reduce arrow ready time by one round with roll/penalty and Acc bonus without aiming or ignore bulk

e348c301-54f5-4ae3-a1eb-619c34052f75.name: 高痛阈
e348c301-54f5-4ae3-a1eb-619c34052f75.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

34855174-1632-4236-bfb5-4031b6329fbc.name: 幸运
34855174-1632-4236-bfb5-4031b6329fbc.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

855b5872-ab6a-4aac-889f-a1b1e2730635.name: 易于命中
855b5872-ab6a-4aac-889f-a1b1e2730635.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

1c88d0c4-c7fa-4664-b8cb-5f68e6f115e4.name: 标志性装备
1c88d0c4-c7fa-4664-b8cb-5f68e6f115e4.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

406ea269-8964-4b52-96b8-19b056159c60.name: Weapon Bond
406ea269-8964-4b52-96b8-19b056159c60.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.
